titleStmt.title: A ready vvay to remember the Scriptures. Or, A table of the Old and Nevv Testament. By that late able, painfull, and worthy man of God, Ezekiel Culuervvell, minister of the Word
titleStmt.author: Culverwell, Ezekiel, 1553 or 4-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Clark, and are to bee sold at his shop vnder St. Peters Church in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop vnder St. Peters Church in Cornhill
